  • Method Details

    • setConnection

      public void setConnection​(int fromLayerNumber, int fromNeuronNumber, int toLayerNumber, int toNeuronNumber) throws NNException
      Create a specific connection between two neurons
      Parameters:
      fromLayerNumber - Specify the layer from where the connection starts
      fromNeuronNumber - Specify the neuron from where the connection starts
      toLayerNumber - Specify the layer where the connection ends
      toNeuronNumber - Specify the neuron where the connection ends
      Throws:
      NNException - if Layer/Neuron is not created

    • setNetworkTransferFunction

      public void setNetworkTransferFunction​(TransferFunction transferFunction)
      Set Transfer function for all neurons in this neural network
      Parameters:
      transferFunction - Transfer function to be set for all neurons in the specified layer

    • setLayerTransferFunction

      public void setLayerTransferFunction​(int layerNum, TransferFunction transferFunction) throws NNException
      Set Transfer function for all neurons in a specific layer
      Parameters:
      layerNum - Layer number
      transferFunction - Transfer function to be set for all neurons in the specified layer
      Throws:
      NNException - if the Layer is not created

    • setNeuronTransferFunction

      public void setNeuronTransferFunction​(int layerNum, int neuronNum, TransferFunction transferFunction) throws NNException
      Set Transfer function for a specific neuron
      Parameters:
      layerNum - Layer number
      neuronNum - Neuron number in the specified layer
      transferFunction - Transfer function for each neuron
      Throws:
      NNException - if the Layer/Neuron is not created

      Parameters:
      size - Specify how many neurons the layer will have
      transferFunction - Set the transfer function for all neurons in that layer

      MultiLayerNetwork Builder

    • addLayer

      transferFunction - Set the transfer function for all neurons in that layer
      inputFunction - Set the input function for all neurons in that layer
      Returns:
      MultiLayerNetwork Builder

    • build

      public MultiLayerNetwork build​(boolean connectNeurons) throws NNException
      Build the Multi Layer Neural Network
      Parameters:
      connectNeurons - Create a fully connected neural network. If the value is false a MultiLayerNetwork with no connection is build and the user should manually set the connections.
      Returns:
      MultiLayerNetwork
      Throws:
      NNException - if the MultiLayerNetwork cannot create the connections

    • build

      public MultiLayerNetwork build() throws NNException
      Build a fully connected Multi Layer Neural Network
      Returns:
      MultiLayerNetwork
      Throws:
      NNException - if the MultiLayerNetwork cannot create the connections
